  top: 2cm

format: typst
params:
  startlist: ""
  results: ""
  titles: ""
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
startlist <- yyjsonr::read_json_str(params$startlist)
results <- yyjsonr::read_json_str(params$results)
titles <- yyjsonr::read_json_str(params$titles)

render_starter <- function(...) {
  starter <- tibble::tibble(...)
  
  result_file <- rsvps::fnch_file("quarto/Speaker/Speaker_results.qmd")
  
  child <- knitr::knit_child(result_file, envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE)

  cat(child)
}
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| output: asis

startlist |> 
  purrr::pwalk(render_starter)
```
